DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
Playing enough Cards with the same Type will unlock the specified Effect. Playing a Card with a different Type will delete the Chain. The Chain also wears off at the end of turn.
Damage taken after Block is reduced by this amount. NL Reduced damage is dealt at the end of next turn.
A card counts as a link if it works toward resolving a Chain.
Damage that was relayed. Is dealt to the Player at the end of turn.
When relayed damage is applied, apply less equal to the Toughness Amount.
